a.n: Film Room: Lakers/Celtics, 1985 NBA Finals - Game 6 with Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

p.k: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar talks about the game in which Magic Johnson (Triple-Double) and Abdul-Jabbar (29 points) proved to be too much for the Celtics, as the Lakers defeated the Celtics in a NBA Finals series for the first time.
